Reviews.Content: The most amazing retreat that i've ever been on!!       The morning yoga session - what a view
Reviews.Author: Lynette_7

Reviews.Content: loved Kumara I am from Florida, USA and stayed 3 nights at Kumara in August 2006. The place is very private and peaceful with beautiful padi rice view and birds chirping during the day. Friendly staff and good breakfast. Walking distance to the restaurants, shops and Ubud market. Plan to stay there again in January 2008.
Reviews.Author: BungaMinahasa
